lab: Industrial Electric Drives and Application of PLC
introduction: Welcome to Industrial Electric Drives Lab.

UG: Target group will be updated soon.

objective: Industrial Electric Drives Lab deals with the simulations experiments on introduction to Programmable Logic Controller (PLC), introduction to digital I/O interface to PLC and ladder logic and, applications of PLC.
